::: As Hot Rods missle heads for Hell Beast, he shoves Jackle into into, thus 
saving himself but costing Jackle his left arm...:::

::: Hell Beast ::: Hot Rod...your one big pain in the ass! But a good fighter 
none the less. Predacons, kill him!

::: The Predacons, including Jackle, in severe pain, send a spitefire of 
discharges at the vhicon. :::

~~~~~~~~

::: As the bullets hit Megatron, they bounce off at first as he approaches 
the ram. After several more hits, he begins to get pushed back. :::

::: Megatron ::: You medaling little bastard! This ship will be destroyed, 
filthy Maximal! 

::: With that said, Megatron thrust his Tailgin into the core, and before he 
had a chance to laugh, the Ark erupted in a brilliant explosion. :::
